subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bernard Lagat said he was feeling healthy and fast, and he gave no indication to the contrary by running a controlled race in the opening round of the 1,500 at the world championships.
snippet: Bernard Lagat said he was feeling healthy and fast, and he gave no indication to the contrary by running a controlled race in the opening round of the 1,500 at the world championships.
